original_text: He cried also in mine ears with a loud voice, saying, Cause them that have charge over the city to draw near, even every man with his destroying weapon in his hand.
korean_text: 또 그가 큰 소리로 내 귀에 외쳐 이르시되 이 성읍을 관할하는 자들이 각기 죽이는 무기를 손에 들고 나아오게 하라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: He cried also in mine ears
saying, Cause them that have charge over the city
even every man with his destroying weapon in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 각 사람이 손에 파괴하는 무기를 들고
